title: The Riders Guild Omnibus
description: Read Marta Randall's sensational Riders Guild series - available in an omnibus edition for the first timeIn Mapping Winter, Lord Cadoc Marubin lies dying in the frozen land of Cherek, and chaos threatens the land. During his four decades in power he had held Dalmorat Province in an iron grip, for which his heirs now contend. Cherek is poised on the brink of new-world advancements in culture and technology, but Cadoc’s choice could deny his people that bright fate and seal Dalmorat in darkness.Kieve Rider, sworn to Cadoc’s service, detests both the man she serves and the oath that binds her to his evils. Yet by that same oath it falls upon her to act as lynchpin in Cadoc’s naming of a new heir. Embroiled in the complexities of character, corruption and political intrigue, Kieve struggles to trust anyone, not least herself.In The River South, the adventure continues. Iset Kievesdaughter has no idea why somebody wants to kidnap her, but somebody does, and the attempts are growing ever more deadly...The Riders Guild Omnibus is a dynastic fantasy thriller tale, with a promise of steampunk at its labyrinthine heart.
author: Marta Randall
